text: Sorry man been offline for the last couple of days

so just so I understand the situation completely you have created 5 teams: Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, and Fri. And now you want to assign the contact to the team based on when they enter the workflow. But the issue you're running into is that you can't assign a contact to a nested team? Is that right?

Correct. For example: Bob belongs to 2 teams (Mon = primary & wed = nested). Based on the current HubSpot restrictions he'll only ever be assigned leads based on his primary team and not the nested team
We would need him to be included in the rotation for the Wednesday team
If it is easier, everyone could belong to a single primary team e.g. "Sales" and then nested teams can be used specifically for the workflow
Interesting, this is definitely a <@U01DSSS4Z6D> question
Yeah so that's really what I was thinking and how i have it setup in my portal
All the sales users are in the Sales team and then each have their own nested teams

Scott and I have been in touch over email but for anyone else who comes across this, its an issue related to the associated record properties (data panel) beta that we have going on right now. We made a change Thursday to bring the functionality to the Copy property, Value Equals, and Webhook actions which introduced this issue. Weâ€™re looking into it right now
Thanks <@U01DSSS4Z6D> for your super quick responses.
Going to DM you my calendar link! <@U046C9LKJP8>
